data.title: Raúl Arévalo - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Raúl Arévalo: his birthday, what he did before fame, his family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

Spanish film actor and director who is known for both his feature film roles as well as his recurring television appearances. He is known for having starred as Pedro Suarez in the 2014 film Marshland as well as Eduardo Maranon in the series Le Embajada. He is also known for having directed the film Tarde para la ira.

Before Fame

His acting career started on television in 2001 when he starred in the series Companeros. His film debut came in 2003 when he starred in Los abajo firmantes.

Trivia

He is known for having won multiple Goya Awards including for Best New Director and Best Original Screenplay in 2017 for Tarde para la ira. He is also known for having won in 2010 for his supporting role in the film Gordos.

Family Life

He was born and raised in Mostoles, Spain and is known for having dated Melina Matthews.

Associated With
